snippet: Stuart F. Sucherman, who has helped television networks solve some of their toughest problems, is leaving the chief executive’s suite, but not the consulting group he founded.
abstract: Stuart F Sucherman, who has helped television networks solve some of their toughest problems, is stepping down as chief executive of Sucherman Consulting Group, which he founded; Sucherman will become chairman of company; Erik Sorenson will succeed him as chief.
lead_paragraph: Stuart F. Sucherman, who has helped television networks solve some of their toughest problems, is leaving the chief executive’s suite, but not the consulting group he founded.

headline.main: Longtime TV Consultant and Recruiter Is Stepping Aside, Not Down
headline.print_headline: Longtime TV Consultant and Recruiter Is Stepping Aside, Not Down
